backend/main.mo: Actor implementing marketplace state and logic including users, products, categories, carts, and orders with access control. Provides query and update methods for profiles and product listing.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two APK/AAB-related features to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each major frontend file for documentation or planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH theme variables for light and dark modes and global UI tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up metadata, icons, manifest, and mounting root element for the React app.
frontend/public/.well-known/assetlinks.j: Placeholder Digital Asset Links file requiring real package name and SHA‑256 fingerprint for Android TWA.
frontend/public/.well-known/assetlinks.R: Documentation explaining how to configure assetlinks.json for Android TWA verification and deployment.
frontend/public/downloads/README.txt: Developer guide for hosting APK/AAB files, naming conventions, default filenames, and download URL usage.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, theme colors, and Play Store screenshot assets.
frontend/public/offline.html: Standalone offline fallback page with styling and a retry button.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing cache versioning, core asset caching, and network-first fetch handling with offline fallback.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app router setup defining layout and all route configurations for pages in the marketplace app.
frontend/src/components/AuthGuard.tsx: Wrapper component that blocks access for unauthenticated users and prompts sign‑in via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying navigation links, copyright, and a referral link with dynamic app identifier.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with logo, search bar, navigation links, cart indicator, and mobile menu using authentication and cart data.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Authentication button that toggles sign‑in/sign‑out using Internet Identity and clears cached queries on logout.
frontend/src/components/ProductForm.tsx: React form component for creating or editing products, managing fields like name, description, price, stock, category, and image.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Dialog prompting new authenticated users to set up their profile with name, email, and seller preference.
frontend/src/hooks/useAabDownloadValidat: Hook that validates an AAB download URL and tracks validation status and results.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useApkDownloadValidat: Hook that validates an APK download URL and exposes validation state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, login, logout, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for user profiles, products, categories, cart, and related mutations using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS config defining color variables, dark mode styles, and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query, Internet Identity, and rendering the main App.
frontend/src/pages/AabDownloadPage.tsx: Provides an AAB download page that normalizes the filename, validates the download URL, and offers copy-to-clipboard link actions with UI alerts.
frontend/src/pages/AccountOrdersPage.tsx: Displays the user's order history with status badges and links to order details, handling loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/ApkDownloadPage.tsx: Shows an APK download page that ensures a valid filename, validates the file URL, and includes security warnings and copyable links.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Renders the user's shopping cart with product data, quantity updates, computed subtotal, and empty/loading handling.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Implements the checkout form, validating shipping info, summarizing the cart, and creating an order before redirecting to confirmation.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page with a hero section, featured products, and category browsing, loading product and category data dynamically.
frontend/src/pages/InstallAppPage.tsx: Provides step‑by‑step instructions for installing the PWA and links to the mobile app packaging guide.
frontend/src/pages/MobileAppPackagingGui: Explains how to package the site as a mobile app and includes metadata, copy helpers, and external tool requirements.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Displays a confirmed order with basic details, shipping info, and navigation options after purchase.
frontend/src/pages/OrderDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed order information, item breakdowns, product data lookup, and order status with guarded access.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx: Renders the site's privacy policy with sections on data handling and user information.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Loads and displays product details with add‑to‑cart functionality, authentication checks, and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Displays all products with search, category, and price filters using query hooks and UI components.
frontend/src/pages/SellerDashboardPage.t: Provides seller tools to create, update, and deactivate products, showing only items belonging to the logged‑in seller.
frontend/src/pages/SupportContactPage.ts: Shows support contact info, business address placeholders, and FAQs using cards and accordions.
frontend/src/pages/TermsOfServicePage.ts: Renders the Terms of Service with structured sections covering user responsibilities and platform rules.
frontend/src/utils/aabValidation.ts: Validates remote AAB file URLs via HEAD/GET requests and returns typed status results.
frontend/src/utils/apkValidation.ts: Validates APK file URLs similarly to AAB validation, checking availability and content type.
frontend/src/utils/clipboard.ts: Provides a helper to copy text to the clipboard with error handling.
frontend/src/utils/siteOrigin.ts: Returns the site's origin safely for client or server environments.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routes), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them when needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, animations, plugins, and layout settings.
project_state.json: Tracks project version, goals, architectural notes, known issues, and implemented features for the e-commerce app.
